overview_of_class: This seminar will focus upon social psychological research and theory concerned with the self and issues of identity. Classic and contemporary readings will be used to illustrate basic issues concerning the study of the self, including issues related to the self-concept, self-esteem, and self-regulation. Grading is based upon class discussion and three research proposals.
name: Topics in Social Psychology
title: WCAS PSYCH 489-0-20 Topics in Social Psychology

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This seminar will focus upon social psychological research and theory concerned with the self and issues of identity. Classic and contemporary readings will be used to illustrate basic issues concerning the study of the self, including issues related to the self-concept, self-esteem, and self-regulation. Grading is based upon class discussion and three research proposals.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Grading is based upon class discussion, weekly thought papers/discussion questions, and a research proposal.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Classic and contemporary readings (posted on blackboard) will be used to illustrate basic issues concerning the study of self, including issues related to the self-concept, self-esteem, and self-regulation.

subject: PSYCH
